By accelerating the pace of drug discovery and development, XtalPi aims to contribute to a healthier society worldwide. Founded in 2014 by a group of quantum physicists at MIT, XtalPi has since grown into an elite team of researchers with multi-disciplinary expertise in physics, chemistry, pharmaceutical R&D, and algorithm design. The first step is to introduce touch to virtual interactions—via TVs, AR, and VR displays. Emerge Wave-series is the anchor product line for the emotion AI. The patented consumer device emits precise ultrasonic forcefields that can be physically felt with bare hands—imagine a “virtual high five” or holding hands across the globe, with no gloves or controllers needed. We are proud of our impact-focused and diverse team—70% of us are immigrants and first-generation Americans. Founded in 2015 and based in Los Angeles, CA, Emerge is backed by venture capital firms including M13 and Microsoft co-founder Paul Allen’s Vulcan Capital, and other notable investors such as former Google CEO Eric Schmidt, and co-founders of Blizzard Entertainment, Twitch, and Riot Games.

Imagry was selected as an “Autonomous Transport System Vendor” by Transdev (the world’s largest public transportation operator, working in 21 markets), and was also awarded two “Best Practices” awards by Frost & Sullivan, one for Enabling Technology Leadership for AV solutions and the other as a Customer Value Leader. CTRL-kit is a wireless, non-invasive electromyography device that translates neural signals into control. Industries: Analytics, Apps, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Career Planning, Enterprise Software, Health Care, Hospital, Psychology, Software, Staffing Agency
Description: DoorSpace is a SaaS Platform transforming the way healthcare organizations retain and develop their clinical talent
Top 5 Investors: MassChallenge
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Apps, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Health Care, Professional Services, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: DoorSpace is transforming the way healthcare organizations retain and develop clinical talent. We have an innovative solution that flips the script on the usual question “what makes people leave?”, and instead asks “what makes people stay?”.  We’ve built a platform specifically designed to make it easier for organizations to create a workplace where people want to stay.  With our solution, healthcare organizations are better able to:  * know your people, and build strong relationships with them  * Reduce friction/frustration in clinician’s workflow by eliminating wasteful administrative tasks * support your people more effectively in their career development ** All while dramatically reducing the amount of time your clinicians and your administrative team is spending on manual data entry and paper pushing. **  How We Do It:  DoorSpace’s SaaS platform provides an intelligent data management system, enabling clinicians and their employers to collaborate, manage and maintain mission-critical personnel data.  DoorSpace provides a “single source of truth” that is updated in real-time across the organization each time an employee’s data file changes. We provide organizations with the workforce data they need to make data-driven decisions, and we reduce the time high-value talent is spending on low-value administrative tasks.  The immediate value DoorSpace provides our customers is that we clean up a lot of back office "clutter", automating the ongoing organization and maintenance of personnel data and documents.  The long term value DoorSpace provides to healthcare leaders is transparency across their workforce with real-time reporting and superior data accuracy, enabling better, faster decisions.  Specific Pain Points We Address:    * Clinicians and administrators wasting valuable time pushing paper and manually moving data from one silo’d system to another;    * Healthcare leaders wait months to get reports on the state of their workforce, delaying the resolution of serious problems until after impacted clinicians have quit;    * Inability to quickly identify clinician’s strengths and weaknesses to ensure strengths are leveraged while bolstering weaknesses with the right training;    * Delays that are weeks and often months long in getting things done - from placing a new clinician to billing insurance companies and every step along the way, back office inefficiencies      are costing organizations time and money they can’t afford to spend;   * Employers need to both ramp up recruiting to keep staff - ratios, and they need to increase investment in retention with limited resources;    * Growing turnover and no insights or clear strategic retention plan beyond paying clinicians more money;   * Growing frustration among clinicians, especially doctors and nurses, which has led to an increase in medical errors, nurse strikes, turnover, and disengagement from patient care work;

Top 5 Investors: Rethink Impact, Fusion Fund, Kickstart, Wavemaker 360, DigiTx Partners
Industry Groups: Apps, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Education, Health Care, Information Technology, Mobile, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Savonix provides a valid and reliable measurement of cognitive function mapped to real world outcomes in domains like cognitive flexibility and on road performance in aging populations. Their customers include doctors, researchers, Fortune 50 insurance, and governments. Their platform provides users with easy to use and accessible tests of their brain function in multiple domains from memory to implicit learning that they can complete on a smartphone or tablet – guided and reported on by a virtual clinician. This information can in turn be used to understand risk for dementia and other brain disorders, as well as drive precision medicine in treatment planning and diagnosis.  Unique to Savonix is their 3D game platform for testing that drives meta-data which has already resulted in the ability to report on the novel cognitive domain of Implicit Learning without adding a test but deriving it from passive in app performance in gold standard measures. Savonix is the only widely available mobile-ready digital cognitive test for early detection of cognitive change that is backed by decades of research into cognitive testing. They didn’t invent the wheel, they made it affordable, accessible, actionable and scalable.

Description: Hybrid Edtech & Fintech with AI-Powered FLEC education technology with real income generation & banking tools.
Founders: Anna Grace Du Noyer, Edward Fulford, Gene Lindberg, Jack Schoenthaler, John Seib, Justin James, Kamal Moumnneh
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Education, Financial Services, Other, Science and Engineering, Social Impact, Software
Full Description: Electus Global Education Co. is a hybrid edtech/fintech social enterprise with globally patented educational and financial technologies that empower young people with essential life skills for a future with a better quality of life.  Through our flagship technology, Life Hub, Electus provides a transformative 360-degree knowledge and experiential educational system that empowers children aged 6 to 18 to learn financial literacy, entrepreneurship, career and work readiness as well as real-world income-earning skills and behaviors at home, in school, and in their communities.  Through real-world earning and income generation opportunities, we equip them with financial management skills while boasting features akin to youth banking apps, such as the Life Hub Visa reward card and administrator controls. Electus is pioneering the future of learning by building the world's largest library of diversified educational content, featuring a groundbreaking monetized learning model. At the heart of this is a groundbreaking monetized learning model, designed to revolutionize how learning is accessed and experienced. This goes beyond simply amassing resources; it's about a powerful dual approach to content – original content creation and strategic curation via powerful partnerships – to construct a dynamic ecosystem where diverse learning types and styles are catered to and knowledge is delivered in engaging, accessible formats, with the added powerful incentive of monetized rewards through Life Hub Visa Reward Cards. Life Hub's unique approach integrates "Edu-Jobs," where educational tasks translate into tangible earnings for learners, micro-credentials that validate their burgeoning skills, and a holistic development model that cultivates capabilities far beyond rudimentary financial knowledge.  Life Hub distinguishes itself by serving a broad user base, fostering profound educational outcomes, and forging robust connections with the corporate world, preparing today's youth for tomorrow's challenges. When education directly mirrors the lived experiences of young people, the resulting impact resonates with profound depth and enduring effect. The most transformative and lasting learning occurs when children forge authentic connections between their education and the realities of their world.  For young minds, the power of learning is amplified exponentially and sustained indefinitely when classroom concepts are clearly reflected in their surrounding world. By illuminating the direct relevance of their studies to the world around them, we unlock a deeper, more durable form of understanding in children. Life Hub is designed to be accessible across all socioeconomic levels, aiming to empower even those in upper and middle-class as well as underserved communities.

Description: Chimera solves the challenges of CARs with drug-responsive gene regulators, which allow us to re-program of the immune system.
Top 5 Investors: Kairos Ventures, Sand Hill Angels, Life Science Angels, The Angels' Forum, Asian Fund For Cancer Research
Founders: Benjamin Wang, Christina Smolke, Gusti Zeiner
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Full Description: They aspire to control the immune system. By the time a patient is sitting in front of an oncologist, cancer has evaded their immune system. Chimeric antigen receptor T-cells (CARs) are reprogrammed immune cells, hot-wired to circumvent immune-evasion. Clinical trials for CARs against liquid tumor cancers, like acute lymphoblastic leukemia and lymphoma, have shown transformative results for patients unresponsive to standard therapy.   However, limited efficacy against solid tumor cancers, life-threatening toxicities, and limited persistence are impediments to these therapies making a wider impact on cancer patients.   Chimera Bioengineering solves the challenges of CARs with drug-responsive gene regulators, which allow us to re-program the "software" of the immune system. They design CAR behavior that promises to minimize toxicity, maximize efficacy and extend persistence so that CARs can lead to cures.w

Industries: Cloud Security, Cyber Security, Data Integration, Fraud Detection, Intrusion Detection, Marketplace, Predictive Analytics, SaaS
Description: SOC Prime operates the world's largest and most advanced platform for collaborative cyber defense that transforms threat detection.
Top 5 Investors: DNX Ventures, Streamlined Ventures, Rembrandt Venture Partners, Digital Future, GrowthUP
Founders: Andrii Bezverkhyi, Oleksandr Bredikhin, Ruslan Mihalev
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Commerce and Shopping, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Information Technology, Payments, Privacy and Security, Software
Full Description: SOC Prime operates the world's largest and most advanced platform for collaborative cyber defense following its mission to transform threat detection with the power of collective cybersecurity expertise. Relied upon by over 11,000 global organizations, SOC Prime supercharges cybersecurity operations enabling teams to hunt for threats and defend against attacks easier, faster, and more efficiently than ever before.  Founded in 2015 by security analysts and Detection Engineers, we have built the platform to help companies establish basic security practices, improve threat visibility, and advance automated incident response. Our technology helps enterprises, governments, MSSPs, and MDR providers overcome the challenges of the global talent shortage, threat complexity, alert fatigue, data quality, and cost-efficiency. SOC Prime Platform enables security teams to address the challenges of building advanced and threat-specific detections, organize and execute around strategic detection objectives, and manage the deployment of content at scale across a diverse range of security analytics tools. We serve Fortune-100 and Forbes Global 2000 enterprises, as well as government organizations by providing a platform for global collaboration, open-source technologies, and the highest level of support. SOC Prime helps customers centrally source and support detection content to maximize the value of their existing security investments. Powered by collaboration from a global cybersecurity community, our Detection as Code platform curates the most up-to-date Sigma rules and integrates with over 44 SIEM, EDR, and Data Lake platforms. Flexible subscriptions ensure that both organizations and individual operators can benefit from enhanced cyber defense capabilities.  Threat Detection Marketplace, the world's leading and largest security analytics repository powered by SOC Prime Platform, delivers access to a constantly growing library of 500,000+ context-enriched detections aligned with the MITRE ATT&CK® framework and continuously updated. SOC Prime supports continuous content quality improvement backed by feedback from 11,000+ organizations, 55,000+ users, and 800 threat bounty members, who actively contribute their own detection content to the SOC Prime Platform while receiving recurring rewards for their input.  Our team is diverse and distributed, comprising seasoned security experts with 20+ years of experience in the industry, creative designers, multilevel software developers, young and ambitious security researchers, analysts, and business leaders. We strongly believe that cybersecurity is one of the major challenges for humanity and can be improved by open source, knowledge sharing, and a performance-driven culture.

Among its accolades, in 2019, Pinscreen developed the first real-time deepfake technology which was presented at the World Economic Forum in Davos, and SIGGRAPH 2020. Description: CarForce is a multi-brand enterprise software platform that delivers real-time vehicle health insights using EDGE computing and ML
Top 5 Investors: LAUNCH, Digitech Venture Capital Fund, SeedSumo, Hella Ventures, RoseRock
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Internet Services, Other, Software, Transportation
Full Description: Customer Problem: There are 162 million used vehicles on the road today equipped with complex maintenance systems but without embedded telematics or diagnostic connectivity.   Consumers driving these vehicles may see a check engine light go on in their car, but they are dependent and distrustful of the mechanic. Dealers are in the dark, having zero awareness or information about the issue. Resultantly, dealers are leaving money on the table from missed service revenue and OEM customer loyalty incentives.  Solution: CarForce has developed a complete end to end solution that leverages after market telematics to provide real time updates on the health of consumer vehicles. Service centers now have the ability to see service opportunities in real time enabling them to serve their customers by having first right of refusal, order parts more quickly, and offer their customers an on-demand concierge experience. Management: CarForce was founded by Jessika Lora, the former Head of Automotive Partnerships and GM of eBay’s Vehicles C2C business. While at eBay Motors, the world’s #1 automotive marketplace, she managed strategy and operations for a $7.3 billion dollar business and led the turn around of eBay’s $1.6 billion dollar consumer-to-consumer vehicle sector with double-digit growth. She developed her results driven track record as a management consultant for Deloitte Consulting and is a Stanford BS and MS graduate with 10+ years of automotive and e-commerce experience.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Automotive, Machine Learning, Sensor, Software
Description: Oculii develops AI Radar Perception Software that significantly enhances ADAS today and enables full autonomous driving in the future.
Top 5 Investors: Conductive Ventures, R7 Partners, First Star Ventures, Legend Star, Taiwania Capital Management Corporation
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Hardware, Science and Engineering, Software, Transportation
Full Description: Oculii is creating a next-generation AI software platform for radars that’s exponentially higher resolution, longer range, more accurate, and less expensive than conventional solutions – increasing safety and reliability. The promise of autonomous vehicles depends on high-performance, all-weather, low-cost and scalable perception technology, and Oculii is bringing it to the world.  Oculii's AI software amplifies the resolution of any radar platform, enabling high performance perception for the next generation of autonomous systems. Traditional phased array radars have been used for decades and follow a strict size for performance tradeoff - the larger the sensor aperture, the higher the angular resolution. Oculii’s Virtual Aperture Imaging radar technology fundamentally breaks this tradeoff - enabling its sensors to trade increased compute/processing for angular resolution enhancement with the same physical aperture. Leveraging this technique enables Oculii sensors to extract unprecedented accuracy, range, and 4D positioning information from commodity off the shelf low-cost radar elements, bringing high resolution radar imaging to the next frontier.  Oculii is backed by some of the top investors and corporations from Silicon Valley, and is working with the leaders in Self Driving Vehicles, Robotics, and Drones - helping them deliver on an autonomous future with an advanced, robust, affordable perception platform.

Full Description: Fracta uses machine learning and big data to optimize infrastructure investments – starting with a water main pipe replacement prioritization solution for U.S. water utilities. There are more than one million miles of water main pipe in the U.S., most of which are forecasted to reach the end of their life cycle by 2050. This is a $1 trillion problem for the 50,000 water utilities in the U.S. and the consumers they serve. Fracta’s machine learning-powered intelligence tool offers the most scalable solution for utilities looking to accurately assess pipe replacement needs, forecast risk, and control spending. Fracta will give utilities the most comprehensive view of conditions allowing them to optimize replacement decisions and reduce liability by 40 percent or more between now and 2050.

Description: Perceptive Automata enables those vehicles to understand what people might do next so they can navigate safely and smoothly around humans.
Top 5 Investors: National Science Foundation, BoxGroup, Slow Ventures, Toyota Ventures, First Round Capital
Founders: Avery Faller, David Cox, Sam Anthony, Sid Misra, Walter Scheirer
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Hardware, Science and Engineering, Software, Transportation
Full Description: Perceptive Automata is solving what is often described as the hardest of the hard problems for automated driving: human behavior prediction technology for the safe large-scale rollout of highly automated (L2/3) and autonomous (L4/5) vehicles, especially in urban areas. The company enables those vehicles to understand what people might do next so they can navigate safely and smoothly around humans, including pedestrians, cyclists, and other drivers. The level of understanding of our human-like AI goes well beyond what standard physics-based approaches can deliver, including information that can’t be gained any other way. Importantly, in addition to increased safety, we enable a much more natural and smooth human-like driving of L4/5 autonomous vehicles. This is essential for autonomous vehicles to be accepted into a human-dominated road environment and also by passengers of robotaxi services. Without this capability autonomous vehicles simply will not function well enough. Perceptive Automata is working with OEMs, suppliers, and tech companies that are building or integrating ADAS and autonomous driving systems. The team is comprised of Harvard, MIT, and Stanford neuroscientists and AI experts working out of offices in Boston and Silicon Valley.

With Aural Analytics’ downloadable apps, any smartphone or tablet becomes a powerful brain health monitor. This technology augments traditional functional rating scales commonly used to measure neurological health in clinical trials with objective, interpretable, and continuous outcomes. In turn, this results in more reliable and higher resolution outcomes for evaluating the effectiveness of drugs or other interventions. Aural Analytics’ technology can reveal the incremental changes that occur as a patient progresses from one point on a functional rating scale to the next.

Full Description: The Beautiful.ai team has spent decades working on presentations—writing them, designing them, and building software to make them. We believe that the only way to guarantee good presentation design is to build the intelligence of a designer directly into the tool. Thus, Beautiful.ai suggests ways to visualize your ideas and makes it incredibly easy to customize the design. It knows what’s on your slide, what you might add later, and how to adjust the layout when you do. (And we’d like to think it has pretty good taste, too). Top 5 Investors: Avi Peretz, Elvira Fainshtein, Michael Fainshtein, Yaron Adler, Oded Federbusch
Founders: Daniel Gurevich, Elvira Fainshtein, Eugene Volkov, Kirill Igin, Michael Fainshtein, Ramil Teregulov, Yitzhak Weiss
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Design, Hardware, Health Care, Information Technology, Internet Services, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: IoT and IoMT (Healthcare IoT) creation require ever-increasing and sophisticated electronic design. It also demands a superior level of expertise and necessitates the need for experienced and highly professional companies to expedite the development process. At the core of every electronic product is the electronics (hardware) and firmware (software) needed to run it. Mircod experience and multi-disciplines enable the company to provide turnkey development of: • Circuit Schematics: Analog & Digital, Gerber Artwork, and Layout Design. • Embedded Systems. • Firmware & Micro Controller Programming Software Design. • User-Interface Development. • Hardware Design for CE, FCE, UL, ROHS, WEEE, and FDA. The ability to provide the right, properly “up and running” comprehensive prototype for the desired idea, while selecting the precise components, defines all aspects of a product's performance, realistic proof of concept, durability, cost, and successful market penetration. MIRCOD brings together personnel with substantive expertise in all primary disciplines required to deliver the most complicated hardware and software solutions. This flexible and multi-skilled team brings an inherent understanding of the R&D in hardware and software related activities and the interfaces with other system delivery disciplines (mathematical algorithms, system engineering, sourcing, advanced materials, and manufacturing) required for success. MIRCOD also has the advantage of having worked on a diverse range of activities across a varied customer base in both production and prototyping capacities. BIOTECHNOLOGY Industry - MIRCOD actively participates in R&D projects initiated by international consortiums. Gene therapy technology developed in consideration with international top cell and gene biotech companies and universities, guarantees to transform tomorrow's medicine by treating the causes of disease rather than the manifestations. IoT Industry - We make the Internet of Things easy from Sketch to Scale. MIRCOD white-labeled rapid IoT web-based platform for rapid design, prototyping, design, and manufacturing is a hardware and software-agnostic system with white-label mobile apps, private BA and BI, complete device management, custom-defined analytics, and advanced AI. ROBOTICS Industry - MIRCOD AI-enabled robots are designed to work with scientists on a daily basis in a high demanding space at biotech laboratories. The MIRCOD autonomous robotic arms can be left alone to perform time-consuming biotechnological tasks in R&D biotech labs like setting up comprehensive predefined experiments in POC stations. HEALTHCARE Industry - MIRCOD team believes that today's remote monitoring technology isn't sufficiently advanced to predict a potential adverse event and alert a monitoring provider before disaster strikes. Our mission is to enhance these technologies and bring to the market an “ease of use” remote monitoring technology platform that enables continuous, configurable, wireless acquiring of biometric parameters from the human body. (Wherefore platform is not limited only to healthcare!)

The tech recruiting product helps enterprise teams, start up founders and agency recruiters spend less time finding and researching potential candidates, so they can spend more time connecting with and recruiting people. Founded by tech recruiters, the team is embedded in tech communities and hyper-focused on data sources overlooked by general data aggregators. By training machine learning models using richer software community data, humanpredictions more accurately suggests when to most effectively contact potential candidates. At humanpredictions, they supercharge intelligent, relationship-focused technical leaders and tech recruiters by giving them tools that perform their research automatically. The decisions of who to email, when to reach out, which events to attend, and ultimately where and with whom to spend their time are automated. By rebuilding the craft of recruiting,  they empower recruiters to do the real, human work: building relationships and evaluating talent. Customers also purchase data for research purposes including VC's assessing potential investments, geographic talent concentration market research, competitive business intelligence, and capital markets trading.

Industries: Computer Vision, Health Care, Health Diagnostics, Machine Learning, Medical, PaaS, Software
Description: Insight Optics is a PaaS connecting general care providers to local specialists for video data transfer.
Top 5 Investors: Microsoft, Newchip Accelerator, Ideaship, CREATE-X, Health Wildcatters
Founders: Aaron Enten, Jermaine Fanfair, Theodore LaGrow
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Hardware, Health Care, Software
Full Description: Insight Optics, is an impact driven startup dedicated to connecting Primary Care Providers with local specialists for assisted diagnostics. We do the heavy lifting with machine learning and computer vision to ensure untrained individuals have captured the right content and that it is of a diagnosable quality prior to transmission. We have built our solution to ensure that we can capture non-adherent patients where they already are by deskilling the process and improving accessibility for the most rural, impoverished, and marginalized populations. We've made it profitable to prevent diseases for the most at-risk Americans Business Overview:  Insight Optics empowers primary care providers (PCPs) to record and refer preventative pre-screening videos to local specialists for assisted diagnostics. Our goal is to enable PCPs to efficiently detect early signs of preventable diseases before permanent damage is done. We accomplish this by providing PCPs a platform to connect and send patient data to local specialists. This allows both users to monetize otherwise unrealized referral incentives and provide better care. Problem: Over 154 million patients in the United States are recommended for an annual retinal exam, especially those with a history of diabetes or high blood pressure. Unfortunately, less than 50% of this population will receive their screening due to the difficulty of visiting a specialist, lack of education or available specialists. However, most of these patients do see PCPs annually.   Solution: We’ve developed a telemedicine PaaS, enabling PCPs to record and refer retinal exams to local specialists for assisted review. PCPs create a new revenue stream through reimbursements and government incentives. Specialists find qualified leads and increase their screening capacity without the need for in-person appointments in a non-adherent population. Benefits: The OptoView system acts as a new revenue stream for both PCPs and specialists through reimbursement. The tool satisfies HEDIS requirements for PCPs and acts as a lead generation tool for specialists to find new patients. Annual reports determine whether managed care organizations receive reimbursements or penalties from state and federal agencies. Our application is designed to satisfy the requirements for annual diabetic eye screenings, increasing an organization’s compliance rates and ophthalmologists prioritize sick patients.

Description: Aerotronic collect data on power line health to provide higher quality insights at a big cost reduction vs today's paper-based solutions.
Top 5 Investors: Techstars, PlanetM
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Consumer Electronics, Consumer Goods, Data and Analytics, Hardware, Science and Engineering, Software, Transportation
Full Description: Aerotronic is a data analytics company that uses aerial and ground data to report on the health of power lines at a significant cost reduction versus existing solutions. Powerline inspections today are qualitative, done manually, and stored as hard copies. Engineers fly in a manned helicopter and take notes on the condition of the lines. Each inspection costs $2K+ per mile and takes time to collate and track. High-speed data capture using manned, unmanned, and ground-based vehicles. The data is processed using a proprietary analytics platform and accessed by clients through a web portal. Late stage discussions with 2 utility companies on pilot studies. Flew power lines in North Carolina after Hurricane Florence, and sent findings to FEMA, Duke Energy, & NCDOT. Aerotronic charges for transmission line inspections at $1000/mile (50% market rates with 80% margin). Subscription model to their portal allows for 3D time-series data access and preventative maintenance predictions using machine learning. Marketplace for vegetation management bids and other services allow us to capture commissions which create an additional revenue stream. Chris, the CEO, is a helicopter pilot, aerospace engineer, and on his second drone company after a successful exit. Neerav, the COO, has an MBA, and ran a manufacturing firm with 50 employees specializing in electro-mechanical assemblies for the DoD and its prime contractors. They have developed a hybrid single rotor autonomous unmanned system capable of flying 500 miles; they can cover entire the US with 14 base stations and 28 aircraft can Inspect the entire transmission grid in 5 days.

Description: Edammo is a provider of real-time predictive analytics solutions intended to be used by businesses.
Top 5 Investors: Newchip Accelerator
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: We support solutions needed in the real world for the application of data science. Current data analytics technologies require large amounts of training data and long training times-this is not viable for most companies. Contrarily, Edammo generates results based on small training samples and can create new models in real-time. We are committed not only to providing our clients with innovative machine learning solutions, but long-term support so that our clients can achieve their goals. Developed and designed using in-house breakthrough, predictive analytics technology, Edammo enhances insights through  innovative machine learning software. With a strong focus on real-time analysis, Edammo delivers dynamic and fully automated solutions without requiring users to manually adjust parameters. Another key aspect of Edammo Technology is its ability to  provide highly accurate results even based on small amounts of training data. In addition, our solution is fully versatile and can be implemented as either a cloud-based service or a local application. The key proprietary advantages of the Edammo Data Analytics  solutions is its ability to process transient data in real-time and the ability to derive insights from even small amounts of training data. Stationary components can be learned by traditional machine learning methods as they are stable in time. Transient components are dynamically changing depending on independent factors not directly available to the user. Competitors use the approach of utilizing a high volume of stationary data, while identifying past patterns can help forecast future trends-this model cannot leverage dynamic data. In the wake of a highly volatile global economy, modern companies will be heavily defined by their ability to adapt and respond quickly to unexpected fluctuations in their environment.

Top 5 Investors: Real Ventures, Société Daniel St-Gelais inc., Beel Technologie, Ginette Lehoux, Altaf Sheriff

Full Description: AN   INTRODUCTION   TO   DASBOX technologies DASBOX   is   a   Watchdog   -   an   electronic   monitoring   and   surveillance   platform   that captures   data   using   sensor   technologies,   processes   data   and   delivers   business intelligence   and   actionable   alerts   for   exceptions   reporting   -   all   for   a   low   monthly   service fee. Your   dog   uses   five   senses   to   detect   unwanted   situations. Our   DASBOX   units   are   equipped   with   up   to   36   sensors. Your   watchdog   will   bark   to   warn   you.   But   what   if   you   are   not   there? Our   DASBOX   will   send   you   a   text   message   or   an   email   as   an   actionable   alert.      All   data is   also   processed,   analyzed   and   visualized   to   form   the   basis   for   reporting   and   informed business   decision   making. DASBOX   designs   and   engineers   industrial   ruggedized   multi-sensor   devices   that   capture and   send   encrypted   data   to   the   DASBOX   cloud   server.   The   data   is   processed   and analyzed   for   unwanted   situations   or   pattern   deviations   for   report   to   the   end   user. The   DASBOX   acts   like   a   trained   watchdog   alerting   you   of   unwanted   situations   so   you can   take   immediate   action   to   safeguard   immediate   situations   or   potential   situations   and exposures. Our   DASBOX   service   platform   addresses   the   needs   of   a   multitude   of   markets.      By collecting   36   different   data   types,   combined   with   the   embedded   GPS   geolocation feature,   the   DASBOX   service   platform   is   the   perfect   solution   for   any   markets   requiring monitoring,   surveillance   or   performance   metrics   collection   and   analysis. Our   business   model   provides   access   to   the   DASBOX   platform   of   services   for   a   monthly recurring   fee   combining   a   basic   services   model   and   premium   services   for   those   who require   value-added   services   such   as   API   access,   visualization,   data   analytics   and more.  ____________________________________________________________________ Contact   Bill   Mustard   by   phone   on   914-275-8462   and   by   email    bill@dasbox.io Website    www.dasbox.io  ____________________________________________________________________ keywords:  IoT, M2M, Big Data, AI, Block Chain, Data Collection, Monitoring, Business Intelligence, B2B, B2C, B2B2C, B2B2B

Full Description: Price Elasticity Modeling. Price Optimization. Demand and procurement planning. Impact of price changes on demand. Determining what promotions to run and when. Determining how much of each product to buy within your capital budgets. Mapping and tracking competitor pricing. And how they impact demand, and pricing. Better store ordering /store allocation (pull vs push) – to meet store needs and not overdo it. And allocating across stores in an optimal manner. Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Corporate Training, Education
Headquarters Location: New York, New York, United States
Description: Artificial Intelligence Supporting Human Imagination
Founders: Edouard Siregar, Fabio Serenelli, Jevgenij Werner
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Education, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: SOFIA's Landscape EXplorer (LEX) will be a cloud-based SaaS, providing a 24/7 personal trainer to boost one's actionable metaskills: (1) portable (not attached to a job), (2) universal (applicable to any cognitive challenge), (3) critical (economically essential - STEM, Biz, Finance etc.) The LEX SaaS can serve individuals (B2C), private corporations (B2B STEM, Education, MBA etc., and economic policy (B2G STEM boosters) Learning meta-skills is done by exploring 10 types of cognitive challenges (from real-world situations), under the guidance of an AI-driven avatar. During exploration, the avatar raises systematic questions for planning, problem-solving, explaining etc. endowing the user with sound reasoning practices in the context of real-world challenges. This real-world challenge grounding, differentiates LEX from test SaaS (SAT, GRE, LSAT, MCAT etc), solution SaaS (Wolfram Mathematica, MatLab, AXIOM etc), and brain trainers (Lumosity, Games).

Full Description: WISE integrates electric storage techniques into a single delivery system and connects with a Smart Meter to create a home electric power source. The system is designed to generate the precise amount of power needed to operate a home during the peak-demand periods each day. WISE uses a comprehensive software suite to allow electric utilities and customers to communicate with the system. Consumers will be given additional options to control the home’s general lighting, appliances, and other devices connected to the electricity in their home. The software features a mobile application that provides remote access via smartphone, computer or other web-enabled mobile devices.
